home.title: مافیا باز، وب اپلیکیشنی است که دورهمی های مافیایی شمارا هیجان انگیز تر و راحت تر می کند.
home.description: MafiaBuzz is a web application to setup and manage 'Mafia Party Game' easily.

steps.desc1: مافیا باز یک بازی دستجمعی است که شامل درگیری بین دو گروه است اقلیتی آگاه ( مافیا ها )، و اکثریتی نا آگاه ( شهروندان ). در شروع بازی به هر بازیکن مخفیانه نقشی اختصاص داده می شود که طبق آن نقش، فرد جزو یکی از ۲ گروه مافیا یا شهروندان قرار می گیرد. بازی دارای ۲ مرحله ی متناوب است : شب، که در آن مافیا مخفیانه بی گناهی را به قتل میرساند و روز، که در طی آن بازماندگان درباره هویت مافیا بحث می کنند و برای از بین بردن یک مظنون احتمالی، رأی گیری می کنند. بازی تا زمانی ادامه دارد که : شهروندان همه ی مافیا ها را از بین ببرند، یا مافیاها تعدادشان از شهروندان بیشتر شود.

MafiaBuzz is played by two teams: Tho Mafia and The Citizens . Live games require a moderator ( God ) who does not participate as a player, and identities are assigned by application. At the start of the game, every mafioso is given the identities of their teammates, whereas citizens only receive the number of mafioso in the game, and do not know which players are mafia and which are citizens.
There are two phases: Night and Day. At Night, certain players secretly perform special actions; during Day, players discuss and vote to kill one player, or eliminate, one player. These phases alternate with each other until all mafioso have been eliminated or until the mafia outnumbers the citizens.
Some players may be given roles with special abilities (Chosen by Game Creator)

Night: All players close their eyes. The moderator then instructs all members of The Mafia to open their eyes and acknowledge their accomplices. They will pick a victim by silently gesturing to indicate their target and to show unanimity then close their eyes again. A similar process occurs for other roles with nightly actions.

Day: The moderator instructs players to open their eyes and announces what happened the previous night. Discussion ensues among the living players. At any point, a player may accuse someone of being a mafioso and prompt others to vote to kill them. If over half of the players do so, the accused person is eliminated and Night begins. Otherwise, thos phase continues until a killing occurs. Dead players are not permitted to attempt to influence the remainder of the game. Because players have more freedom to deliberate, Days tend to be longer than Nights.
Different roles are making MafiaBuzz much funnier and more enjoyable. In below we are explaining about each role seperately:

god.name: God
god.godButton: I'm God! Show me game details
god.actionHintText: Please select the person who takes action:
god.lastPhaseText: Please select who died last day with people's vote :
god.mafiaPartyText: Tell Mafia members to open their eyes and see each other
mafiaPartyException: Drunk should not wake up and just rise one hand to let others know him.
Traitor should not wake up at all.
god.noLog: There is nothing to show yet!
god.resetText: Do you want to reset game with same roles?
god.resetTotalText: Are you sure? Your selected roles and players will reset
god.skipText: Do you want to skip this action for tonight?
god.hackedPerson: is Hacked...!!! Just wake him up but he is unable to perform an action
god.deadPerson: is Dead...!!! You can just call role to balance the game for remaining players
god.revivedPerson: is Revived...!!! But doesn't have his role anymore.
god.actionQuestion2: to wake up and tell you the target for
god.lastNightTitle: Tell people what happened last night

dashboardHint.name: angel
dashboardHint.hint: Bring back Player to life by God's power

dashboardHint.name: pending-action
dashboardHint.hint: Player has action but not used.

dashboardHint.name: disabled
dashboardHint.hint: Player has no action or passive.

dashboardHint.name: healed-icon
dashboardHint.hint: Player has been healed and couldn't get kill this night

dashboardHint.name: linked-icon
dashboardHint.hint: Player has been linked to another player and when one of them dies, the other dies aswell

dashboardHint.name: silenced-icon
dashboardHint.hint: Player has been silenced and can't talk during next day

dashboardHint.name: hacked-icon
dashboardHint.hint: Player is hacked and can't use action or passive this night

dashboardHint.name: invisible-icon
dashboardHint.hint: Player is invisible and cannot be detected by Detective

dashboardHint.name: shield-icon
dashboardHint.hint: Player has shield that prevents one death at night

roles.name: مافیا
roles.description: Mafia is a regular mafioso with no special abilites and if there is no 'Godfather' in game, May kill one person at night

roles.name: گادفادر
roles.description: The Godfather is boss of mafioso and can kill one person at night and also his mafia identity will never get revealed by 'Detective'. If Godfather died during the game, killing role will pass to the next person and that person doesn't have ability anymore

roles.name: روسپی
roles.description: Ruspy is a mafioso who can silence one person (Cannot silence same player on successive days). The silenced person wakes in the morning and is immediately instructed not to talk until the end of the day. They can still raise their hand to vote

roles.name: مست
roles.description: Drunk is a mafioso who drinks too much and can't remember his teammates but his teammates will know him by raising hand

roles.name: خیانتکار
roles.description: The Traitor is a mafioso who lives between citizens, He Doesn't wake up at night and will not revealed as a mafioso by 'Detective', but works to protect mafia and make them win

roles.name: آشپز
roles.description: Chef is a mafioso who can poison one person at night and make him reveal his role to chef

roles.name: یاکوزا
roles.description: The Yakuza is a mafioso with the power of sacrifice himself from the second night and choose an innocent and God will touch that person's head to give up his role and join the mafioso with 'Mafia' role.

roles.name: شهروند
roles.description: Regular Citizen wihout any power and just want to make peace in city

roles.name: پلیس
roles.description: The Detective is with Citizens and can detect whether a player is a mafioso or not. He will typically wake up, and point at one person; The god will silently indicate to the Detective whether that player is Mafia or Citizen.

roles.name: دکتر
roles.description: The Doctor is with Citizens and defends others, He can save one perseon or himself during night

roles.name: الهه عشق
roles.description: Cupid is a Citizen and chooses a pair of Lovers on the first night. Lovers are bind to each other and if one of the pair dies, the other dies as well.

roles.name: بمب
roles.description: The Bomb is with Citizens and when he gets killed during day or night, He will detonate himself and kill his sibling players.

roles.name: مادر بزرگ
roles.description: Grandma is a Citizen and she is so  sensitive, If someone touch her at night will get killed instantly

roles.name: ضد گلوله
roles.description: The Bulletproof is with Citizens and has a shield that can save him for one death at night.

roles.name: شاه شب
roles.description: Night King is one of Citizens, He can ressurect one person each night and make that person one of his skeletons (The resurrected person doesn't have power anymore but still can be a member of Mafia or Citizen). Remember that if Night King dies, all of his skeletons will die instantly.

roles.name: هکر
roles.description: Hacker is an intelligent and coder Citizen who wakes up first at night and hacks one person. Hacked person cannot use his action or passive during that night

miniYakuza.name: Mini Yakuza
miniYakuza.description: Mini Yakuza is a secret mafia between citizens and chosen by main Yakuza when he was sacrificing himself

skeleton.name: Skeleton
skeleton.description: Skeleton is Night King's minion but still has loyalty to his team (Mafia or Citizen) and has no Action or Passive
